column2: "W-welcome back! I was a little worried. I'm really glad that you came back safely."
"....so, um, you asked me before why I wanted to become an ARKS, right?"
"I have an older brother in ARKS. When I hear him talk about his work, I really yearn to become an ARKS."
"I think if I were an ARKS, maybe I could do something for people ...s-sorry for such a vague motive."
"So I want to learn a lot more to become an ARKS. Please work with me again."
